channel.title: I need help with npcdrops
channel.description:
well first of all i spawned some guards, and i put there npcdrops in the .cfg file like this :
npcdrop = 9 995 12 75 //guard drop/coins/12 of it/75% chance drop. npcdrop = 9 2530 1 100 //guard drop/bones/1 of it/100% chance drop.
and yes i am tabing, but for some reason the npcs are not dropping what i put, they drop nothing at all. please help me. k0 gawd k0. and yes i got a npcdrops.java also.
Posted on: December 30, 2008, 01:31:56 pm -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- and i do compile and run also. :S
i have posted this earlier but i dont understand what the person said, this is what he/she said :
you have to go into the item2.jave through item4.java, then search the npc name, or code. The npcdrop.cfg doesnt work for all servers/sources. Hope i could help =)
what exactly do i search for? i typed npc name and there code but i dont understand please help.
my source is fearnypks and i think was originally created by tonypker. please help.

item.title: I need help with npcdrops
item.dc:creator: @Fireweaver0 Fireweaver0
item.description:
@Fireweaver0 wrote:

you donâ€™t put npcdrops in the cfg file
you put them in npchandler under void monsterdrop or something

*example

if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 509) {
ItemHandler.addItem(6104, npcs[NPCID].absX,
npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID),
false);

Not sure how you change the percent of chance they will get it though

Read full topic
